name: Kinetic (itch) (MisterProject, ARandomProgrammer)
description:
KINETIC

Kinetic is a fast-paced low-poly movement shooter with a focus on customizable and easily swappable ability loadouts. Set in a space station taken over by robots, the game encourages split-second decision-making regarding weapon management and target prioritization.

CREDITS
Dan "MisterProject" Isamu - Programming, Level Design, Game Design
Luís Felipe Dobner Henriques - 3D Modelling, Game Design
burandelei - Level Design, Game Design
Vitor Kenzo Fukuhara Pellegatti - Sound Design, Game Design
